metadata.title: CVE-2019-12387 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In Twisted before 19.2.1, twisted.web did not validate or sanitize URIs orHTTP methods, allowing an attacker to inject invalid characters such asCRLF.

criterions.comment: twisted: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
twisted: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
twisted-py3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
